sources.title: Harriet Craig (1950) Joan Crawford, Wendell Corey - Full Movie.
sources.description: Harriet Craig is a 1950 American film drama starring Joan Crawford and Wendell Corey. The screenplay by Anne Froelick and James Gunn was based upon the 1925 Pulitzer Prize-winning play Craig's Wife, by George Kelly. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harriet_Craig Â Suggested Film Noirs : http://bit.ly/36oLNCR The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: Domineering Harriet Craig holds more regard for her home and its possessions than she does for any person in her life. Among those she treats like household objects are her kind husband Walter, whom she has lied to about her inability to have children; her cousin Claire, whom she treats like a secretary; and her servants whom she treats like slaves.
metadata.Writer: James Gunn, Anne Froelich, George Kelly
metadata.Actors: Joan Crawford, Wendell Corey, Lucile Watson
